topic.title: Recommended specifications
topic.shortdesc: The recommended hardware specifications to install and effectively operate Couchbase Server include:

ul.li: Four core 64-bit x86 CPU running at 3GHz; six cores when using Cross Datacenter Replication (XDCR) and Views.
A local block-based storage device (hard disk, SSD). Network filesystems such as CIFS and NFS are not supported.
